speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0272/2006 ) by Mr Ehler, on behalf of the Committee on Economic and Monetary Affairs, on follow-up to the report on competition in professional services ( 2006/2137(INI) ).

agenda_item: Follow-up to the report on competition in professional services (debate)
